mosekTools.solver.model package¶

mosekTools.solver.model.bound module¶

mosekTools.solver.model.math module¶

mosekTools.solver.model.math.absolute(model, name, expr)[source]¶
mosekTools.solver.model.math.l1_norm(model, name, expr)[source]¶

Given an expression (e.g. a vector) this returns the L1-norm of this vector as an expression. It also introduces n (where n is the size of the expression) auxiliary variables. Mosek requires a name for any variable that is added to a model. The user has to specify this name explicitly. This requirement may disappear in future version of this API.

mosekTools.solver.model.math.l2_norm(model, name, expr)[source]¶

Given an expression (e.g. a vector) this returns the L2-norm of this vector as an expression. It also introduces an auxiliary variables. Mosek requires a name for any variable that is added to a model. The user has to specify this name explicitly. This requirement may disappear in future version of this API.

mosekTools.solver.model.math.l2_norm_squared(model, name, expr)[source]¶

Given an expression (e.g. a vector) this returns the squared L2-norm of this vector as an expression. It also introduces an auxiliary variables. Mosek requires a name for any variable that is added to a model. The user has to specify this name explicitly. This requirement may disappear in future version of this API.
